original_text: He was with David at Pas Dammim when the Philistines gathered there for battle. At a place where there was a field full of barley, the troops fled from the Philistines.
korean_text: 그가 바스담밈에서 다윗과 함께 있었더니 블레셋 사람들이 그 곳에 모여와서 치니 거기에 보리가 많이 난 밭이 있더라 백성들이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망하되

sentences.original_text: He was with David at Pas Dammim
when the Philistines gathered there for battle
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 그곳에서 전투를 위해 모였을 때

sentences.original_text: At a place where there was a field full of barley
the troops fled from the Philistines
